episodes.title: The Cult of Parenthood
episodes.description:
Have you ever wondered how parental alienation operates similarly to cult dynamics? 


########

Welcome to The Anti-Alienation Project, where I discuss all things parental alienation... from the POV of an adult child who's been through it. I'm sorry you're going through this, but I'm that glad you're here:) 

https://www.theantialienationproject.com

episodes.title: Inside Catholic Family Land: My Disturbing Experience
episodes.description:
00:00 — I Thought Catholic Family Land Was a Joke
02:08 — What Catholic Family Land Actually Is
05:10 — Why I’m Sharing This Now
07:45 — My Childhood Context & Family Breakdown
10:32 — The Founders & Vatican Ties
14:05 — Gwen Conner, Sainthood & Idolization
17:20 — What “Family Consecration” Really Means
21:10 — Where Consent Disappears for Children
24:35 — Programming Disguised as a Family Vacation
28:10 — Unpaid Labor, Vows & Obedience
31:45 — Why This Felt Cult-Like
35:20 — Teen Programming & Emotional Control
38:40 — Other Survivors Speak Out
40:10 — Final Thoughts & If You’ve Been There


When I was 12 years old, my mom took me and my brothers to a place called Catholic Family Land in Ohio. For years, it was framed as a wholesome Catholic family retreat...

In this video, I share my personal experience attending Catholic Family Land every summer, and why, looking back as an adult, I believe it caused serious religious and psychological harm.

I discuss:
– Family consecration and lack of consent
– Emotional manipulation and fear-based faith
– Vows of obedience, poverty, and chastity (worker culture)
– Teen programming and psychological control
– Why Catholic Family Land felt cult-like

This video is not an attack on Catholicism or people of faith. I respect religious belief and the Catholic Church. This is a critical examination of one organization and the impact it had on me and others.

If you attended Catholic Family Land or experienced religious trauma, you are not alone.

*Content warning: spiritual abuse, emotional manipulation, religious trauma

Comment if you want to see Part 2 or share your experience.

##########

episodes.title: I Was Part of a PARENT-CHILD CULT
episodes.description:
After hearing researchers describe parental alienation as a cult, I decided to consult America’s leading cult expert: Dr. Steven Hassan. 

The book “Freedom of Mind” by Dr. Hassan characterizes what makes a destructive cult and how to help a family member leave one. 

In this video, I dissect the first part of this book as it relates to parental alienation… from the POV of a formerly alienated child. 

(Stay tuned for part 2!)

& Check out Dr. Hassan’s book here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/theanti-alienationproject/list/2SDBQNGS0JNNW?ref_=aip_sf_cur_spv_ons_d

#######
